channel.title: Posts on Lucydevdesign
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Lucydevdesign

item.title: Life is like a video game
item.description: On august 12 2024 I will have been on this planet for 27 years, I felt like I hadn’t done much with the precious time on here and felt like i was counting down the years in my quarter life crisis. For those of you struggling with those kinds of thoughts I urge you not to feel sad or depressed. you’ve been blessed with the gift of life and I will tell you now the secret to not worrying.

item.title: Blog is Working!
item.description: After a few nights and many powdered energy drinks later, I have finally managed to get the blog section of this website fully functional! after struggling with my ADHD not being able to get anything done for such a long time, it is such a relief to actually be able to say I’ve accomplished a nice milestone in my tech endeavours thanks to the power of caffeine! if you have access to ADHD medicine it is obviously a much better option.
